# What Time Today

> Simple tool to share your availability as plain text. Select time slots, convert timezones, copy and send. No calendar links needed.

## What it does

A mobile-first web app for quickly sharing when you're available. Instead of sending calendar links, select your free time slots and copy formatted text to paste anywhere - email, chat, SMS.

## Features

- Visual time slot picker (week view or generic weekday view)
- Timezone conversion (show availability in recipient's timezone)
- 1-hour or 30-minute intervals
- 12h/24h time format toggle
- Copy to clipboard with one tap
- Works offline (PWA)
- No signup required

## Use cases

- Sharing availability with recruiters
- Coordinating meetings with coworkers
- Planning with friends across timezones
- Quick response to "when are you free?"

## URL

https://whattime.today/
